summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5488 for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 21 and 22, Law's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue West and 2nd Avenue West, from West Garfield Street to West Blaine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70063, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
